downloadTitle: Azure AD Password Protection for Windows Server Active Directory
downloadDescription: Azure AD Password Protection for Windows Server Active Directory is used to prevent weak passwords being used in the organization using Windows Server Active Directory
detailsSection:
Azure AD Password Protection helps you establish comprehensive defense against weak passwords in your on-premises environment. With Azure AD Password Protection you will be able to:
  • Protect all password set and reset operations in Azure and Windows Server Active Directory by ensuring they do not contain weak or leaked password strings.
  • Control Azure AD Password Protection for both Azure AD and on-premises Windows Server Active Directory from a unified control panel in Azure AD portal.
  • Generate informative insights by using simple PowerShell cmdlet.
installInstructionSection: Please see the full documentation located at https://aka.ms/aadpasswordprotectiondocs
